Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 64 off 44 balls and became the leading run scorer in T20 World Cup history
Hasan Mahmud (3/47) was the pick of the bowlers for Bangladesh
Arshdeep Singh (2/38) picked up two wickets for India
Liton Das top-scored for Bangladesh with 60 off 27 balls
Bangladesh lost 4 wickets for 9 runs in 11 balls
Virat Kohli hit a six off Hasan Mahmud in the 19th over
KL Rahul scored a fifty and then was run out
Suryakumar Yadav scored 30 off 16 balls and was dismissed by Shakib Al Hasan
Arshdeep Singh and Nurul Hasan played crucial roles in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: Virat Kohli expressed his excitement about the World Cup in Australia
The Indian team management backed KL Rahul after his previous poor form
Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
The coach emphasized the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day
The Indian team lost wickets quickly but Virat Kohli was well settled on 44
